value_claims.claim_description: Continental Finance Company reduced data-building time by 75% after adopting Experian Assistant, demonstrating significant acceleration in model development processes.
value_claims.source_quote: Continental Finance Company, for example, reduced data-building time by a remarkable 75% after adopting Experian Assistant.
value_claims.quote_location: Mid-article, under 'Developed in Collaboration with Leading Financial Institutions' section
value_claims.attribution_evidence: The reduction is explicitly attributed to adopting Experian Assistant, a GenAI-powered toolset.

value_claims.claim_title: Model development time reduced from months to days or hours
value_claims.claim_description: Experian Assistant transforms model development processes, reducing timelines from months to days or even hours through GenAI-powered automation.
value_claims.source_quote: By leveraging Generative AI (GenAI), this revolutionary solution slashes model development turning months-long processes into days—or even hours.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: The time reduction is directly attributed to leveraging Generative AI through Experian Assistant.

value_claims.claim_title: Democratized access to sophisticated analytics through natural language
value_claims.claim_description: Experian Assistant enables users to query data, write code, and build models using plain language, democratizing access to analytics previously requiring extensive technical expertise.
value_claims.source_quote: Experian Assistant allows users to query data, write code, and build models in plain language—democratizing access to sophisticated analytics.
value_claims.quote_location: Under 'Empowering Data Scientists and Analysts' section
value_claims.attribution_evidence: Natural language processing capabilities of Experian Assistant directly enable this democratization.

value_claims.claim_title: Accelerated development lifecycle through digital model building consultant
value_claims.claim_description: Experian Assistant provides developer support to accelerate the development lifecycle by functioning as a digital model building consultant available to users.
value_claims.source_quote: Experian Assistant focuses on developer support to accelerate the development lifecycle by having a digital model building consultant available to users.
value_claims.quote_location: Quote from Craig Focardi, Principal Analyst at Celent
value_claims.attribution_evidence: The AI assistant directly provides consultant-level support to accelerate development.

value_claims.claim_description: Experian Assistant for Model Risk Management automates documentation, provides customizable templates, and centralizes model governance while aligning with regulatory guidelines.
value_claims.source_quote: Financial institutions can now automate documentation, use and customize pre-built templates, and centralize model governance—all while aligning with regulatory guidelines like SR 11-7 (US) and SS1/23 (UK).
value_claims.attribution_evidence: AI-powered Experian Assistant directly automates documentation and governance processes.

value_claims.claim_title: Enhanced productivity and collaboration for data scientists
value_claims.claim_description: The tool boosts productivity and fosters collaboration and accessibility, driving financial inclusion by broadening access to data-driven insights across organizations.
value_claims.source_quote: The tool not only boosts productivity but also fosters collaboration and accessibility. This innovation will drive financial inclusion by broadening access to data-driven insights.
value_claims.quote_location: Under 'Empowering Data Scientists and Analysts' section
value_claims.attribution_evidence: Experian Assistant's capabilities directly boost productivity and enable collaboration.

value_claims.claim_title: Proven cost savings through optimized analytics processes
value_claims.claim_description: Businesses achieve proven cost savings, enhanced data visibility, and faster product deployment by optimizing analytics processes with Experian Assistant.
value_claims.source_quote: By optimizing analytics processes, businesses can achieve proven cost savings, enhanced data visibility, and faster product deployment.
value_claims.quote_location: Under 'Developed in Collaboration with Leading Financial Institutions' section
value_claims.attribution_evidence: Cost savings are achieved through AI-optimized analytics processes.

context_claims.claim_description: Experian Assistant was unveiled at Money 20/20 in Las Vegas in October 2024.
context_claims.source_quote: Today at Money 20/20 in Las Vegas, Experian unveiled Experian Assistant

context_claims.claim_description: Experian Assistant is designed specifically for financial institutions and the financial services industry.
context_claims.source_quote: a groundbreaking toolset that transforms analytics and modeling for financial institutions

context_claims.claim_title: Experian has over a decade of AI expertise
context_claims.claim_description: Experian brings more than ten years of experience in AI development to this solution.
context_claims.source_quote: With more than a decade of AI expertise, Experian is leading the charge in responsible AI development.

context_claims.claim_title: Integration with Experian Ascend Technology Platform
context_claims.claim_description: Experian Assistant is integrated into the Experian Ascend Technology Platform.
context_claims.source_quote: Integrated into the Experian Ascend Technology Platform™, Experian Assistant is designed to streamline data analytics processes

context_claims.claim_title: Developed in partnership with major financial institutions
context_claims.claim_description: Experian Assistant was developed in close collaboration with the world's largest financial institutions.
context_claims.source_quote: A standout feature of Experian Assistant is its development in close partnership with the world's largest financial institutions.

context_claims.claim_description: Continental Finance Company is a customer that adopted Experian Assistant.
context_claims.source_quote: Continental Finance Company, for example, reduced data-building time by a remarkable 75% after adopting Experian Assistant.

context_claims.claim_description: The solution supports model development, data analytics, and modeling lifecycle management.
context_claims.source_quote: Experian Assistant marks a significant leap forward in how businesses handle the modeling lifecycle.

context_claims.claim_description: Experian Assistant for Model Risk Management supports model governance lifecycle including documentation and validation.
context_claims.source_quote: this first-of-its-kind solution helps financial institutions streamline the different stages of the model governance lifecycle—from documentation to model validation.

context_claims.claim_description: Experian emphasizes responsible AI development ensuring organizations benefit from advanced analytics without compromising privacy or ethical standards.
context_claims.source_quote: This debut underscores Experian's commitment to responsible AI innovation, ensuring that organizations benefit from advanced analytics without compromising on privacy or ethical standards.
